articles.author: Joey Roulette
articles.title: NASA’s Mars copter survives brisk night alone in key pre-flight test
articles.description: NASA’s Ingenuity helicopter survived its first night alone after detaching from its Perseverance rover ahead of a debut flight demonstration.
articles.content:
Severed from Perseverance, Ingenuity proves it can spend nights on its own
Image: NASA / JPL

articles.author: Megan Farokhmanesh
articles.title: The creator of Threes is back with a game about slaying giant beasts
articles.description: Threes designer Asher Vollmer is launching a new studio. Vollmer announced the company’s first game, a turn-based adventure called Beast Breaker, alongside Vodeo Games. The game is heading to Nintendo Switch and PC.
articles.content:
Threes designer Asher Vollmer is launching a new studio, Vodeo Games, and announced the company’s first game, a turn-based adventure called Beast Breaker.

articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.title: Go read this feature on how India’s digital revolution started with missed calls
articles.description: Before high-speed internet and cheap mobile data were common in India, companies like ZipDial used missed calls and SMS to build out a suite of free “online” services, according to Rest of World.
articles.content:
Rest of World covers ZipDials efforts to bridge the offline-online gap
Photo by JEWEL SAMAD/AFP via Getty Images
